name: Unreal Mojo
description:
Founded in 2009, Unreal Mojo is a team of highly skilled professionals with primary aim at banking and aeronautic mobile application development. Our portfolio features half a dozen of mobile banking clients for leading banks in Eastern Europe (Alfa-Bank, Sberbank, Bank of Moscow and more) as well as airline companies (S7 Airlines, UTair) and one of the largest telecom operators in Russian Federation (MegaFon).
With over 70 projects completed over our 6 year history, we got the skills to make a perfect iOS, Android or Windows Phone app for your needs.
READ MORE...
